message: Let's split it 60-40, fair and square!
Let's flip the script this time! I'll take 60% and you get 40%.  Fair's fair, right?
Not so fast, Bob! I'm not buying the 60-40 split. I'll make a new offer: 55-45 in my favor.
You can't handle the truth! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
